it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI

  • public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
    Public class that has the function of Command-line Interface. Handles the prints and client inputs during the game.

      • printIncreaseOrDecrease

        public int printIncreaseOrDecrease()
        Notifies the player who can choose whether to increase or decrease the die value, after the player had chosen the tool card number 1. The player must enter 1 to increase the value of the die, 0 to decrease it.
        Returns:
        the choice of the player (0 or 1).

      • printChooseDieValue

        public int printChooseDieValue()
        Notifies the player who can choose the value of the extracted die, after the player had chosen the tool card number 11.
        Returns:
        the value of the die inserted by the player.

      • printChooseAnotherDie

        public java.lang.String printChooseAnotherDie()
        Notifies the player that he can choose another die, after he had used the tool card number 12. The player must insert 'yes' or 'no'.
        Returns:
        the player choice.
